original_text: I said this about the woman who had become tired of having sex with so many men: “They will continue to have sex with her, as she is a prostitute.” I said this about the woman who had become tired of having sex with so many men: “They will continue to have sex with her, as she is a prostitute.”
korean_text: 내가 음행으로 쇠한 여인을 가리켜 말하노라 그가 그래도 그들과 피차 행음하는도다

sentences.original_text: of having sex with so many men
sentences.korean_translation: 너무 많은 남자들과 성관계를 하는 것에

sentences.original_text: They will continue to have sex with her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 계속해서 그녀와 성관계를 할 것이다
